mapper.select: (select no, dong, aptname, buildyear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo where aptname like concat(#{aptName}, '%')) union all (select no, dong, aptname, buildyear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo where dong like concat(#{dongName}, '%'))
mapper.insert: insert into house_ongoing(no, comp_seq, title, content, deal_amount, floor, area, direction, type, fee, room, bathroom) values ( #{houseNo}, #{compSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{dealAmount}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{direction}, #{type}, #{fee}, #{room}, #{bathroom} )
mapper.select: select h.register_id, h.no, h.comp_seq, h.title, h.content, h.deal_amount, h.floor, h.area, h.direction, h.type, h.fee, h.room, h.bathroom from house_ongoing h, company c where h.register_id = #{registerId} and h.comp_seq = c.comp_seq

select h.register_id, h.no, h.comp_seq, h.title, h.content, h.deal_amount, h.floor, h.area, h.direction, h.type, h.fee, h.room, h.bathroom from house_ongoing h, company c where h.comp_seq = c.comp_seq order by h.register_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select register_id, no, title from house_ongoing order by register_id desc limit 5
